file_content.text: Once my research is complete, the Republic will be thanking me.
I just scanned the base. The Colicoid population has been reduced to nearly nothing, and any survivors will die soon enough.
With the evidence of that fiasco finally destroyed, I can continue my research uninterrupted. I'll find a way to tame those creatures yet.
Just keep the Colicoid rampages to a minimum.
I assure you, any future Colicoid "rampages" will be directed toward the Empire, and steered by my firm hand.
Here is the compensation I promised you. Of course, I trust you'll be discreet about all this.
The Colicoids are truly wondrous creatures.
